songs.title: Glove
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
If you lookin' for love (What else?)
I can get you love (I'm sayin')
If you lookin' for drugs, baby (Junkie)
I will come and pull up, baby (Pull up)
If you lookin' for love, baby (Yeah)
You know I fit the glove, baby (What else?)
I just fit the glove, baby (True)
I can fit the glove, baby (True)
If you need love, baby
I can fit the glove, baby
If you need to love, baby
I can fit the glove, mm

[Verse 1]
Yeah, you wanna be noble, then be noble
And if you want both, then be double
I know all about you
You need the truth, I got you

[Pre-Chorus]
You got my excellence, feel it, feel it, feel it
You got my excellence, I'll admit it, 'mit it, 'mit it
You got my excellence, feel it, feel it, feel it
You got my excellence, I'll admit it, 'mit it, admit it

[Chorus]
If you lookin' for love (What else?)
I can get you love (I'm sayin')
If you lookin' for drugs, baby (Junkie)
I will come and pull up, baby (Pull up)
If you lookin' for love, baby (Yeah)
You know I fit the glove, baby (What else?)
I just fit the glove, baby (True)
I can fit the glove, baby (True)
If you lookin' for love (What else?)
I can get you love (I'm sayin')
If you lookin' for drugs, baby (Junkie)
I will come and pull up, baby (Pull up)
If you lookin' for love, baby (Yeah)
You know I fit the glove, baby (What else?)
I just fit the glove, baby (True)
I can fit the glove, baby (True)

[Verse 2]
Livin' lavish like a mini-series
Burn it down, I hope I get the jewelry
Paradise, you couldn't tell the difference
Ten karats got your ears hangin'
[?], I'ma touch it slow till it turn gold
Drop it down, let it roll, let it roll-roll-roll
Call [?], he gon' take you down
[?]
I just wanna feel the impose
When your pretty toes touch the marble floors

[Pre-Chorus]
You got my excellence, feel it, feel it, feel it
You got my excellence, I'll admit it, 'mit it, 'mit it
You got my excellence, feel it, feel it, feel it
You got my excellence, I'll admit it, 'mit it, admit it

[Chorus]
If you lookin' for love (What else?)
I can get you love (I'm sayin')
If you lookin' for drugs, baby (Junkie)
I will come and pull up, baby (Pull up)
If you lookin' for love, baby (Yeah)
You know I fit the glove, baby (What else?)
I just fit the glove, baby (True)
I can fit the glove, baby (True)
If you lookin' for love (What else?)
I can get you love (I'm sayin')
If you lookin' for drugs, baby (Junkie)
I will come and pull up, baby (Pull up)
If you lookin' for love, baby (Yeah)
You know I fit the glove, baby (What else?)
I just fit the glove, baby (True)
I can fit the glove, baby (True)
